name: Just A Regular Battle Royale
description:
Try in a game in the manner of Battle Royale to outwit all the enemies and win! There are 9 enemies waiting for you in the arena, which you must defeat to a successful end. But watch out for the kill zone!

CONTROLS
  • WSAD -- Walking
  • E -- Pick up guns and items, open chest
  • Left click -- Shoot
  • Right click  -- Show fullsized map
DISCLAIMER

The game was created in a short period of time, so there may be minor errors. If you come across any, feel free to post about it in the comments.
